message: Hi, can you tell me the status of shipment #20451?
My delivery arrived late and the box was damaged.
I still haven’t received my payment for last week’s trip.
When will I get the invoice for the last delivery?
The tracking link doesn’t work, can you update me on shipment 553?
I delivered everything on time but haven’t been paid yet.
Package was delivered to the wrong address.
Can you confirm if order 221 is already in transit?
I was double-charged for a delivery, please fix this.
Everything went smoothly today, thank you!
